Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #106 East 103rd Temporary Reroute near 103rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 106 East 103rd buses temp. rerouted EB: 103rd, King Drive, 111th, Corliss, 103rd; WB: 103rd, Cottage Grove, 107th, King Drive,103rd near 103rd/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 103rd/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via: 103rd, King Drive, 111th, Corliss, and 103rd

Westbound buses will operate via: 103rd, Cottage Grove, 107th, King Drive, and 103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Brown Line Trains
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Please allow extra travel time.
